title: Premiere: Bipolar Sunshine – Drowning Butterflies (MTJ Remix)
content:
Bipolar Sunshine has been on our radar over here at CITR for about a year now and he has continued to please with his just released EP–Drowning Butterflies.

Today we got our hands on a mesmerizing remix of the EP title track by Maths Time Joy. MTJ quickens the tempo, layers the synths and distorts the vocals to create a club ready track that still maintains all the bits that make Bipolar Sunshine so damn good. Think shiny synths, wobbling base, and, aptly, sunshiny melodies. I dare say its impossible not to groove to this.

Bipolar Sunshine will be bringing some much needed light to London tonight as he headlines a show at Electrowerkz where I’m expecting to shake away the Wednesday slump!
